1370: Oderada was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Hille at age 16 in 1370.
Gave birth to Eghenonis in 1370 at age 16.
1372: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1372 at age 18.
1373: Gave birth to Geraldus in 1373 at age 19.
1375: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1375 at age 21.
1376: Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 2 years old.
1377: Gave birth to Gloria in 1377 at age 23.
1381: Gave birth to Abben in 1381 at age 27.
1382: Gave birth to Blankard in 1382 at age 28.
